MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 10-NOV-2020 21:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk affecting properties in Craig Brown Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to repair the third party damaged underground cable, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.50pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:28pm on 10th November 2020.
